document.full_text: with revolutions in egypt and tunisia, conflict in libya and ivory coast and now an earthquake in japan, specialist international crisis management, security and evacuation firms are busier than ever.
document.title: quake, wars, unrest, make evacuation big business
lines_and_colors: with revolutions in egypt and tunisia, conflict in libya and ivory coast and now an earthquake in japan, specialist international crisis management, security and evacuation firms are busier than ever.
